# Elec-Mate

> The complete digital platform for UK electricians. Training, AI tools, certificates, calculators, and business management — all in one app.

## What is Elec-Mate?

Elec-Mate is a mobile-first web application built for UK electrical professionals. It covers every aspect of an electrician's work: creating BS 7671-compliant certificates, performing complex calculations, studying for qualifications, managing apprentices, and running a business.

## Key Features

- **8 Certificate Types**: EICR, EIC, Minor Works, Emergency Lighting, Fire Alarm, PAT Testing, EV Charger, Solar PV — all with digital signatures, observation coding, and PDF export
- **70 Electrical & Business Calculators**: Cable sizing, voltage drop, earth loop impedance (Zs), fault current (PSCC/PEFC), RCD testing, conduit fill, maximum demand, power factor, solar PV, EV charging, arc flash, plus 14 business calculators (quoting, cash flow, tax, VAT)
- **8 Elec-AI Specialists + 12 AI Tools**: Circuit Designer, Cost Engineer, Voice Quotes, Inspector, Maintenance Advisor, Regulations Guide, Study Coach, Assistant — plus Fault Diagnosis, Diagram Builder, Visual Analysis, Report Writer, and more. All trained on BS 7671:2018 + Amendment 3:2024
- **36+ Training Courses**: 18th Edition (BS 7671), Level 2 & 3 Diplomas, AM2 simulator, EPA simulator with AI grading, HNC, plus 24 upskilling courses (IPAF, first aid, fire safety, COSHH, working at height, CDM, confined spaces, and more)
- **Business Management**: Smart quote builder, invoice builder, expenses, project management, scheduling, staff management, Stripe payments, Xero & QuickBooks integrations
- **Employer Dashboard**: Team management, apprentice progress tracking, compliance monitoring, timesheets, leave management
- **Wellbeing & Community**: Mental health support, community chat, Elec-ID digital card, portfolio evidence tracking, OJT hours management

## Who is it for?

- Qualified electricians (domestic and commercial)
- Electrical apprentices (Level 2, Level 3, AM2)
- Electrical employers and contractors
- College tutors managing electrical students

## Compliance

All tools and certificates comply with:
- BS 7671:2018 + Amendment 2:2022 + Amendment 3:2024 (IET Wiring Regulations, 18th Edition)
- Part P Building Regulations (England & Wales)
- Electricity at Work Regulations 1989
- The Electrical Safety Standards in the Private Rented Sector (England) Regulations 2020
